TEXT.TITLE: ASAMERA <ASM> TO SELL DENVER REFINERY
TEXT.BODY: Asamera Inc said it has signed a letter of intent to sell its Denver refinery to Total Petroleum (North America) Ltd <TPN> for undisclosed terms. It said the sale is subject to regulatory approval. Reuter
